column4: Hey quick Wireless question, with the ubunutu 2.10 gentoo live cd my wireless card doesn't work and i have to use an ehternet cable, has that been resolved in the new version? or is there something i can install after i install the os natively on the hardrive?
there is no such thing as an "ubunutu 2.10 gentoo live cd"
not familiar with the names, but the one right before the current release
